ANOVA or ANCOVA (F test)

fancova.Rd

ANOVA or ANCOVA (F test)

Usage

fancova(
  calculate = "selectpower",
  eta2 = 0.01,
  covadj = FALSE,
  ncov = 1,
  nway = "1",
  nlevelsA = 2,
  nlevelsB = 2,
  nlevelsC = 2,
  power = 0.8,
  alpha = 0.05,
  n = 200
)

Arguments

calculate

.

eta2

.

covadj

.

ncov

.

nway

.

nlevelsA

.

nlevelsB

.

nlevelsC

.

power

.

alpha

.

n

.

Value

A results object containing:

results$text2a preformatted
results$plotan image
